page.title: 19OLD MARGATE TOWN CENTRE
page.content: THE OLD TOWN IS BESIDE THE HARBOUR WHERE ALL THE STREETS ARE NARROW.THE MAJORITY OF HOUSES ARE SMALL.THE AREA IS A MIXTURE OF HOUSES AND OLD-FASHIONED SHOPS .THEY ARE BUILT OF BRICK AND FLINT AND ARE IN MANY DIFFERENT STYLES.KING ST. HAS HOUSES WITH DUTCH GABLES,A STYLE BROUGHT BACK TO MARGATE BY SAILORS.THE MAKET PLACE IS A NEWLY PAVED PEDESTRIAN AREA.MANY OF THE SHOPS SELL ANTIQUES OR SECOND- HAND THINGS .THE OLD TOWN HALL IS USED FOR MEETINGS AND HAS BECOME A MUSEUM. THERE IS A LOT OF RESTORATION GOING ON.
